name: Stephanie Weirich
content: Stephanie Weirich Stephanie Weirich ENIAC President's Distinguished Professor of Computer and Information Science School of Engineering and Applied Science University of Pennsylvania email: sweirich at seas.upenn.edu office: 510 Levine Hall office hours: please contact for an appointment postal mail: School of Engineering and Applied Science Department of Computer and Information Science Levine Hall 3330 Walnut Street Philadelphia, PA 19104-6389 Quick Links My publications (including drafts) My github Slides and videos from talks and tutorials CV Penn's Programming Languages group (plclub) Current Ph.
